definition: evoking lifelike images within the mind, a periodical (magazine or newspaper) containing many pictures
details:
adjective
- evoking lifelike images within the mind
= example: evoking lifelike images within the mind
= synonyms: lifelike
- pertaining to or consisting of pictures
= example: pertaining to or consisting of pictures
= synonyms: pictural
noun
- a periodical (magazine or newspaper) containing many pictures
